text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In denen Thurneysischen Buchläden allhier, seynd dato folgende zwey Bücher zu haben, so in Nancy durch Sübscriptiones gedruckt worden. <BIBL><TITLE>Dictionnaire Universel- Francois & Latin, Vulgairement appellé Dictionaire de Trevoux</TITLE>, avec des Remarques d Erudition & de Critique <VOLUME>5. Tom.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1741</YEAR>; davon die 3. ersten Tom. dato schon zu beziehen sind; das gantze Werck kostet samt der Fracht <PRICE>fl. 24</PRICE></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Dictionaire Oeconomique, continant les moyens d'Augmenter son dien & de conserver sa sante</TITLE>, par <AUTHOR>Mister Noel Chomel</AUTHOR>, Augmente dun Nouveau Supplement de deur Volumes, par <AUTHOR>F. Marset, Doct. en Medecines</AUTHOR>. <FORMAT>Avec fig.</FORMAT> <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1741</YEAR>; davon der erste Tomus dato bey ihnen zu beziehen ist; diß gantze Werck kostet samt der Fracht <PRICE>fl. 18</PRICE></BIBL>. So dann sind bey ihnen auch genugsam annoch zu haben: <BIBL><TITLE>Dictionaire Historique & Critique de Mr. Bayle</TITLE>. <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE> <YEAR>1740</YEAR>. à <PRICE>L. 27</PRICE></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Corpus Juris Civilis Romani, cum Notis Gotofrest</TITLE> <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1740</YEAR>. à <PRICE>fl. 10. 48. xr.</PRICE></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Dictionaire Royal, Francois-Allemand-Latin, par le R. P. Fr. Pomey</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4°.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1741</YEAR>. à <PRICE>fl. 5. 24. xr.</PRICE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":15,"explanation":"Fixed encoding issues with special characters (√ symbols), corrected inconsistent PRIZE/PRICE tags to PRICE, fixed malformed FORMAT tags, added missing punctuation after TITLE tag in Bayle entry, corrected spacing issues, and fixed the format notation from \"4√≤\" to standard \"4°\"."}

parsed.explanation: Fixed encoding issues with special characters (√ symbols), corrected inconsistent PRIZE/PRICE tags to PRICE, fixed malformed FORMAT tags, added missing punctuation after TITLE tag in Bayle entry, corrected spacing issues, and fixed the format notation from "4√≤" to standard "4°".
